Summary: From sky to orbit, shining in sunrise rectangle/cylinder shape object
divs: sighting detailswell, from what i hear... http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=wm6um1jeujs and as far as 'wtf is that?' i've seen a few 'unidentified' objects\crafs... notice how i don't mention 'martian'... i recently saw some odd shiny white blimp to rectangle thingamabob going s\w but up into the obrbit of space! sure enough space.com? mentioned the shuttle tracking an object between it and the earth; this was about 9am-1045, the duration so it was not a satelite; they go buy in shorter intervals? anyhow, it may look like a star at that point, i caught it late; but see the size in regards to plane? i caught it just between a cloud bank, my friend could not see it 10plus miles north of here. i think it tumbled at some point; shiny white thing. another person saw it when i lined it up to the ridge of the house; it was very s\w but at high angle, 1-2 oclock south? if i only had the first sight, i thought it was a surveilance blimp\plastic rectangle on the edge of the atmosphere; 3-10 footballs fields length? craaaazy. basically, at least get a nasa or sky tracking group so we don't have to wonder what the hell is looking over our shoulder while we're in our backyard; to suddenly look up and say hey, who installed the orbiting surveilance box!? it's a strange feeling. granted i realize around the same span of days the unmanned shuttle was just launched into operation, so, who knows!?
Object Shape: Blimp, Bullet, Missile, Cylinder, Square, Rectagular
